#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int dig_sum(long long int a)
{
    long long int sum=0;
    while(a)
    {
        sum+=a%10;
        a=a/10;
    }
    while(sum>9)
    sum=dig_sum(sum);
    return sum;
}

int main()
{
    long long int c=0;
    cin>>c;
    while(c!=0)
    {
        long long int temp=0;
        while(c)
        {
            int a=c%10;
            if(a==2 || a==3 || a==5 || a==7)
            temp+=a;
            c=c/10;
        }
        cout<<dig_sum(temp)<<endl;
        cin>>c;
    }
    return 0;
}
